name: eggplant zaalouk
ingredients: 2 small tomatoes or 1 large one (peeled and diced)
1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar (or lemon juice)
steps: Rinse the eggplant, cut it into small cubes. In a small pan or pot, cook the eggplant cubes for 10 minutes over low heat, covered, with olive oil.
Add the diced tomatoes (previously peeled), pressed garlic, paprika, and cumin. Add salt.
Mix while mashing the eggplant with a wooden spoon (to turn it into a puree).
Cover and cook for 20 minutes over low heat, stirring occasionally and mashing the eggplant.
At the end of cooking, pour in the vinegar/lemon juice, mix, and turn off the heat. Let cool before serving.
